original_text: The officers in the land are like wolves that catch other animals and tear them into pieces. They use their power to murder people so that they can take their money for themselves.
korean_text: 그 가운데에 그 고관들은 음식물을 삼키는 이리 같아서 불의한 이익을 얻으려고 피를 흘려 영혼을 멸하거늘

sentences.original_text: The officers in the land are like wolves
They use their power to murder people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람을 죽이기 위해 권력을 사용합니다

sentences.original_text: so that they can take their money
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 돈을 가져갈 수 있습니다
